Dear Fodder -
During =
my breif time in Japan I do not recall ever seeing quality 
replicas of Cho=
kuto. However there were Chokuto submitted for the 
Shinsakuto competitions=
, those I am afraid might cost you as much as 
the originals. Still if you =
have to have one I would look to the modern 
swordmakers,
